verbs.description: The North Korean leader [V: is] said to be keeping a close eye on security on the resort island of Sentosa where he will meet with Trump on June 12 amid fears someone will try to have him killed .

[ARG1: The North Korean leader] is [V: said] [C-ARG1: to be keeping a close eye on security on the resort island of Sentosa where he will meet with Trump on June 12 amid fears someone will try to have him killed] .
The North Korean leader is said to [V: be] keeping a close eye on security on the resort island of Sentosa where he will meet with Trump on June 12 amid fears someone will try to have him killed .

[ARG0: The North Korean leader] is said to be [V: keeping] [ARG1: a close eye] [ARG2: on security on the resort island of Sentosa where he will meet with Trump on June 12 amid fears someone will try to have him killed] .
The North Korean leader is said to be keeping a close eye on security on the resort island of Sentosa where he [V: will] meet with Trump on June 12 amid fears someone will try to have him killed .

The North Korean leader is said to be keeping a close eye on security on the resort island of Sentosa [ARGM-LOC: where] [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: with Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] [ARGM-LOC: amid fears someone will try to have him killed] .
The North Korean leader is said to be keeping a close eye on security on the resort island of Sentosa where he will meet with Trump on June 12 amid fears someone [V: will] try to have him killed .

The North Korean leader is said to be keeping a close eye on security on the resort island of Sentosa where he will meet with Trump on June 12 amid fears [ARG0: someone] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: try] [ARG1: to have him killed] .

The North Korean leader is said to be keeping a close eye on security on the resort island of Sentosa where he will meet with Trump on June 12 amid fears [ARG0: someone] will try to [V: have] [ARG1: him killed] .

The North Korean leader is said to be keeping a close eye on security on the resort island of Sentosa where he will meet with Trump on June 12 amid fears someone will try to have [ARG1: him] [V: killed] .
